description: The Lodi Apple (Malus 'Lodi') is an amazing fruit tree that produces beautiful, crisp, white-fleshed apples with a distinct tart flavor. Its strong growth and vigor combined with its high resistance to diseases makes this variety ideal for home and commercial orchards. Its harvest season begins in late July and early August, making it perfect for summertime snacking! Its tart apples are great for jams and jellies, and its flowers provide a sweet aroma to the air. The Lodi Apple is a must have for any orchard!
